meanings.sent1: I searched everywhere, but found zilches in the lost and found box.
meanings.sent2: After the sale, the store had zilches left on the shelves.
meanings.sent3: When the magician pulled the rabbit out of the hat, it turned into zilches!
meanings.sent4: Her hopes of winning the lottery were dashed when she realized she had zilches on her ticket.
meanings.sent5: The abandoned house was filled with zilches but memories of the past.

meanings.definition: To have no value or importance.
meanings.sent1: The broken toy zilches to the child after he got a new one.
meanings.sent2: She realized the apology meant zilches to him as he continued to ignore her.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to zilches the expensive toy and play with a simple cardboard box instead.
meanings.sent4: His promises turned out to be zilches, just empty words in the end.
meanings.sent5: The old coin zilches to the collector, but holds sentimental value to the owner.
